Great that they all share the same helper method! I am not convinced about the new format and omitting the comma's entirely. Maybe you can add a screenshot to show how it looks? 

Anyway, if the next step would be to move everything over to a conference helper class, like [you suggested](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/586#issuecomment-270620652), then we can reevaluate the formatting when everything is nice in place. Right?
And covered with tests :yay:
